assignment: In your English class you have been talking about wildlife conservation. Now your English teacher has asked you to write an essay
Write an essay using all the notes and give reasons for your point of view
Not enough is being done to protect endangered animals. Do you agree?
which animals are under threat
why do we need to protect these animals
... (your own idea)
name: Wildlife conservation

assignment: In your English class you have been talking about the benefits of regular exercise. Now your teacher has asked you to write an essay.
Write an essay using all the notes and give reasons for your point of view
Should people who are studying or working hard take regular exercise?
lifestyle
health benefits
... (your own idea)
name: Should people do more exercise?

assignment: In your English class you have been talking about jobs and salaries. Now your teacher has asked you to write an essay.
Write an essay using all the notes and give reasons for your point of view
Compared to people in other jobs, sportspeople are paid too much for what they do. Do you agree?
which jobs are important in society
why some sportspeople are paid a lot of money
... (your own idea)
name: Are sportpeople paid too much?

assignment: In your English class you have been talking about urban transport. Now your English teacher has asked you to write an Essay
Write an essay using all the notes and give reasons for your point of view
The only way to solve traffic problems in cities is to improve public transport. Do you agree?
problems with public transport
limiting the use of private cars
... (your own idea)
name: How to solve traffic problems?
